data.actual_result: Full name is shown, breaking window
data.expected_result: Name gets truncated to fit window
data.short_description: Users with super long names break the members panel in server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Find server with user that has massively long name (using zalgo or something like that) - Go to members in server settings - Find user. WIndow will "grow" to fit name, and you lose the ability to kick/ban user.
